about.summary: Fast kd-tree implementation with OpenMP-enabled queries.

name: pykdtree
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.2.1" %}

package:
    name: pykdtree
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    fn: pykdtree-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/p/pykdtree/pykdtree-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    md5: 395603b8821954f1bffaf1913baf42a2

build:
    number: 0
    script:
        - export USE_OMP=1  # [linux]
        - export USE_OMP=0  # [osx]
        - set USE_OMP=0  # [win]
        - python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - setuptools
        - numpy x.x
        - msinttypes  # [win and py<35]
        - gcc  # [linux]
    run:
        - python
        - numpy x.x
        # Needs libgomp.
        - libgcc  # [linux]

test:
    imports:
        - pykdtree
    commands:
        - conda inspect linkages -n _test pykdtree  # [not win]

about:
    home: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pykdtree
    license: LGPL-3.0
    summary: 'Fast kd-tree implementation with OpenMP-enabled queries.'

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - ocefpaf
